name: Lirmi
overview:
Lirmi.com “We connect people around the knowledge.”

Lirmi is an entrepreneurial stage to undertake a Social Network in Latin America is born in the early stages geared for Spanish and English.

Lirmi is “a social network that connects people around the world” based on the publication of questions and articles, which can be ranked by the users based on their collaborative contributions to any area of â€‹â€‹knowledge in the network. Users receive recommendations based on the quality of their contributions.

A network that connects people around the sharing of ideas and knowledge.

This performance-enhanced premium networking and video-conferencing between multiple users editing a Word, PowerPoint and excel in real time.

An e-Store where users can upload their own presentations and files download grantors a price for other users.

In addition to all the premium features one of the things that is most privileged rankeo users globally in various areas of knowledge that are part of lirmi.com

Thanks to which we can generate a global ranking of the most experienced users in various areas of knowledge globally, to be keynote speaker.

The network first stage in its development phase is being supported by Inacap, the network of larger technological universities throughout Chile, which has more than 10,000 teachers and 400,000 students. Lirmi presents teachers and students begin with and then open to the general public worldwide.

A social network without garbage and optimized content to share information and knowledge.
